column5: Great shots!  Next year I'll bring the guitar and harp too!
Congrats on your catches. Great report thanks for sharing.  John
Sure sound like ya's had a great time...
WTG Cliff, congrat's on the SM amd Musky, looks like a great trip!
It was a pleasure to meet you both!!  It won't be the last time im sure... LOL.. with my singing and your playing... we could make pocket change every day!!  (LOL.. ie keep our day jobs!!)
Congrats on the first ski and Bass.
WOW....glad everyone had a great time,congrats on your fishing trip,looked like alot of fun...cheers
Congrats on the firsts and thanks for the great pics and stories to go with them.  Sounds like a great weekend was had by all.

Great report, Cliff.  It was a huge pleasure to finally meet you and Bly.  I'm not sure, but I think yours was the only muskie caught all week!  You are right in that the meal was wonderful, and that the music that followed was a fitting end to another great OFC Lakair event.
Great report and pics - glad to hear you not only did fantastic with the fishing but also in making new friends.  Bet you'll plan for a little longer stay next year.
Cliff,I still say you have a horse shoe  Was great to meet you and Carole,that muskie was a bonus,till next year.You can go carpping now LOL.  Steve

Glad to see you were able to make it! There's a lot of history in that area.  Lake Nipissing figured prominently with French fur traders as a 'highway' plied with their birch bark canoes. Imagine what the fishing might have been like, say 300 years ago!
Wow Cliff and Carol what can I say sounds like a good time so many nice people .2 new species .A Muskie Cool .Hope to meet you and Carol this fall in Quinte.Great report and pics.  MTP
Congrats......  Great job  What's next on the list ????

Next on the list?  I'd have to say I'll have to get my first Salmon, but I'll have to wait until the fall runs.  I have a new float rod just waiting for them!!!  Thanks everyone for your comments...it was truly an unforgettable experience, and anyone who was on the fence on coming out, I urge you to go next year!!!
Great pictures and report! Nice to hear everyone had a good time!

Glad to see you guys made it home and had a a great time with the remainder of your weekend! It was my pleasure to have the both of you aboard my tin can, and you are more then welcome  anytime! Dont believe everything they tell you about me... as it is probably true! LOL..  But seriously it was my pleasure to spend a few, albeit short hours with the both of you. I just wished the winds had died down a bit so we could spend a bit more time on the water.. but that north wind on the way back to my lodge was BRUTAL! to say the least LOL..  As for the fishing... I was trying my Walleye spots at first but I think the combination of the clod front and it being the middle of the afternoon hindered our chances a bit... so off for pike it was!...dang.. could get any of them either... shallow calm bays, weeds and rock structure.. I could'nt buy a fish that afternoon... I was started to get frustrated.. and I said I have one more card up my sleeves lets see what kind of trouble we could get into... Man was I relieved to see Cliff nail a healthy Muskie! it took my frustration away and brought a smile to everyones face!  If anyone here gets a chance to fish w/ Cliff and Carole RUN... Dont Walk at the chance... better people you will not find.  Glad to hear you had a great outing. I was happy to be a small part of it.  Gerritt.
Hey Clifff it was great to meet you and Bly hope to see you guys again next year and dont forget to bring the Guitar you sounded  great!!!!

Excellent report and pics Cliff!!      Thanks for sharing.  I'm glad you both made it back safe and sound.  Congrats on getting 2 new species (your first ever ski and the Bass) and also your new Avid Angler status.  I'm sure the time must have flew by....before you knew it, it was time to go home.  I hope to see you, bly and the rest of the gang next year.  Cheers  FOTB
It was good to see you both again, congrats again Cliff on your two new species...that Bass was a nice one!!!  Maureen
Great Report was a pleasure to meet both of y'all.We got in around 7:30 this evening and I'll be posting some pics tomorrow. Joe
Good report Cliff!  Raf's not that far off    Congrats on your first ski!  Thanks  Whopper
Great report Cliff and nice fish! I enjoyed chatting with both of you and I hope we can get out sometime! -Brian
Looks like a lot of fun up there.  Congrats on the 2 new species.  Nice report CCMT.  Corn  Nug
Well done Cliff. Great report and good to see you holding something other than a carp for a change! LOL  007
welcome back family great to see your report . Congrats on the the ski and smallie . Wolfville will be able to sleep tonight unless you and Bly are going out carping tonight ??
great job!
congrats on getting your 5th specie for your avid angler award ... looks like an amazing weekend ... great pics!
Sounds like tons of fun, wish I was there and not spending 10 hours ... LOL  Please don't forget out nightly feed of your report ;-)
Good to hear your trip went well Cliff. Some nice fish caught, great company in the boat and also around the campfire. Life doesn't get much better.
